titles.title: RATES Act
RATES Act
Returning Amtrak To Economic Sustainability Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to encourage economic sustainability of intercity passenger rail service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
Returning Amtrak To Economic Sustainability Act or the RATES Act
This bill revises the mission and goals of Amtrak. It encourages an economically sustainable intercity and commuter passenger rail system and requires Amtrak to ensure route profitability proportional to the federal share of investment.
